thread.title: Circus maintains flesh-and-blood appeal, says Charlie Chaplin's son

title: Circus maintains flesh-and-blood appeal, says Charlie Chaplin's son
text:
Circus maintains flesh-and-blood appeal, says Charlie Chaplin's son 3:54am IST - 01:03 
As the Budapest International Circus Festival celebrates 250 years of the modern circus, it's remaining relevant even in the digital era, says Eugene Chaplin. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
